title: Training Volume
body: Muscles need adequate total work to grow. Aim for roughly **10–20 sets per muscle group each week** for optimal hypertrophy.

title: Training Frequency
body: Hitting a muscle **about twice per week** balances stimulus and recovery, leading to superior progress compared with once‑weekly training.

title: Recovery & Rest
body: Growth happens between sessions. Leave **≥48 hours** before you train the *same* muscle group again.
